rules_text:
When this creature attacks, it gains first strike until end of turn.
When this creature dies, create a 1/1 red Parasite creature token with haste and “This creature can’t block”. Target player takes a burden.
{3}{R}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Populate. Activate only as a sorcery. [i](Create a token that’s a copy of a creature token you control.)[/i]
